General.Name: Miliboo SA
General.Description: Miliboo Société anonyme designs and provides furniture in Paris and internationally. The company offers sofas and armchairs, chairs and stools, office chairs, tables, storage furniture, rooms, light, decor furniture, and garden furniture, as well as furniture for children. It also designs furniture for animals, such as dog and cat baskets, as well as house for dogs and cats. In addition, the company sells its products through online. Miliboo Société anonyme was founded in 2005 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 14 boulevard de la Madeleine, Paris, France, 75008
